# cloudtemple_compute_virtual_machines (Data Source)

To query this datasource you will need the `compute_iaas_vmware_read` role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudtemple_compute_virtual_machines" "foo" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
